[[Version 1.2]]
* The domain level "Biting Frost," which was previously the only level available on Sunday, was removed from the game. This level used to provide a random assortment of the materials that were available on other days of the week. After the Version 1.2 update players can now pick any of the other domain levels to enter on Sunday.
